Articles.Content: Was wondering if someone could help me out with the altitudes each different antenna would need to be put at (assuming only 1 antenna per satellite) to get a stable communication network that can bounce a signal from the opposite side of the planet to kerbin and reach at min the mun.

You should look up for "Remote tech" mod tutorials there are plenty of them on youtube and internet in general... I don't know 1.2 antennas range/limit but this page should help   https://ryohpops.github.io/kspRemoteTechPlanner/
